entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Biggar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:15 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
